entry.title: New release for Pods-Blitz: v0.7.3
entry.content:
Mon, October 14, 2024

  • Compress RSS files automatically (gzip, brotli)
  • Automatically generate thumbnail images for podcast and episode covers
  • Automatically transform Podcastindex JSON transcript files to Podlove JSON transcript files

entry.title: New release for Pods-Blitz: v0.7.4
entry.content:
Wed, November 27, 2024

  • Use "secure" session cookie only if login is with https
  • Fix potential problem importing images from RSS feed
  • Use language-specific HTML templates
  • Allow spaces in enclosure file names

entry.title: New release for Pods-Blitz: v0.8.0
entry.content:
Fri, April 04, 2025

Main changes:

  • New website theme (based on wordpress twentytwenty)
  • Enable web preview of not yet published episodes
  • Add podcast favicon to all web pages
  • Support feed tag itunes:applepodcastsverify
  • Update list of bots/crawlers to improve analytics
  • Enable more than one user with admin privileges

For a detailed list of changes, please read the git log
